text: 20:31 Mak 13:37; Aposel 19:8-10; 1 Tesalonika 2:11Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia uari bagh gan. Kɨ azenir pumuning ko mɨkezimɨn amizir araziba, ia dagh nɨghnɨgh. Kɨ arueba ko dɨmagaribar, teriba sara, zurazurara nɨghnɨzir aghuiba vaghvagha ia mɨgɨa, tong mɨtetam atɨzir puvatɨ. Egha ghaze, ia uari bagh ganigh.
